hed: 10 Cocktail Clutches to Step Up Your Party-Going Game
dek: With the fall fête season arriving, hit that next cocktail party in style with a glamorous (or quirky!) evening bag.

items.title: Olympia Le-Tan
items.caption:
Keep it youthful with a hand-embroidered storybook clutch for your next evening event. Cinderella is just one in a series of whimsical tales available in the collection this fall.   
Book clutch, limited edition of 77 pieces, $1,880; [olympialetan.com](http://www.olympialetan.com/#eshop/)

items.title: Yliana Yepez
items.caption:
Classic, but far from boring, this mother-of-pearl minaudière is a nod to the Art Deco period when cocktail parties reigned supreme.    
Gaia Mother Pearl Resin Minaudiere, $2,195; [ylianayepez.com](http://www.ylianayepez.com/product-detail/i/320/gaia-mother-pearl-resin-minaudiere)

items.title: Tom Ford
items.caption:
Look right! The black hardware on this clutch is not simply an ornate detail, but a strategically placed lipstick.    
Lipstick glitter-finished Plexiglas clutch, $3,950; [net-a-porter.com](http://www.net-a-porter.com/product/585512/Tom_Ford/lipstick-glitter-finished-plexiglas-clutch)

items.title: Charlotte Olympia
items.caption:
This luxurious suede clutch opens up to a mirror with an inscription that reads, “Yes, you look terrific!”—as if you didn’t already know!    
Vanity clutch, $1,165; [charlotteolympia.com](http://us.charlotteolympia.com/collections/encore/vanity-clutch/5054490535059.html)

items.title: Stella McCartney
items.caption:
The classic Falabella clutch is made over for evening with the addition of a pearl border—the ultimate ladylike detail.    
Black Falabella Shaggy Deer Pearl Bag, $1,140; [stellamccartney.com](http://www.stellamccartney.com/us/stella-mccartney/cross-body_cod45273472ln.html#itemPage=1&mm=1501)

items.title: Balenciaga
items.caption:
This marble-printed leather clutch makes a strong statement without the use of bold color. Perfect for those who prefer a more monochromatic look.    
Marble-Print Le Dix Minaudière, $1,255; [barneys.com](http://www.barneys.com/Balenciaga-Marble-Print-Le-Dix-Minaudi%C3%A8re-504081041.html?utm_source=google&utm_medium=cpc&campaignid=177727241&adgroupid=13221409121&product_id=00505040810423&product_partition_id=116791899161&gclid=Cj0KEQjwvJqvBRCL77m2-uKczsIBEiQAkx8VjKo9wwbofsfWpph8Rs5V0nqsljhUTejK6PY3oaKCUp4aAnKM8P8HAQ)

items.title: VBH
items.caption:
No one makes a structured envelope clutch quite like VBH. The use of stingray makes this version feel extra special.    
Metallic Stingray Envelope Clutch Bag, $1,850; [bergdorfgoodman.com](http://www.bergdorfgoodman.com/VBH-Metallic-Stingray-Envelope-Clutch-Bag-Gunmetal-VBH/prod111320069_cat360100__/p.prod?icid=&searchType=EndecaDrivenCat&rte=%252Fcategory.jsp%253FitemId%253Dcat360100%2526pageSize%253D30%2526No%253D0%2526refinements%253D&eItemId=prod111320069&cmCat=product)

items.title: Anya Hindmarch
items.caption:
For something a bit more playful, this cheeky Anya Hindmarch clutch fits the bill.    
Stop Staring Clutch, $1,595; [anyahindmarch.com](http://www.anyahindmarch.com/Clutches/Stop-Staring-Clutch/Black-5050925888578.html?cgid=CLUTCH&start=36) and Anya Hindmarch, Madison Avenue (646-852-6233)

items.title: Tyler Alexandra
items.caption:
Not exactly a clutch, per se, but definitely the smallest of the bunch. This mini-snakeskin-bag is a fun substitute for a more classic evening option.    
Jamie mini satchel bag in natural cobra, $2,295; [neimanmarcus.com](http://www.neimanmarcus.com/Tyler-Alexandra-Customizable-Handbag-Made-to-Order-Tyler-Alexandra/prod179250039_cat53330733__/p.prod?isEditorial=false&index=15&masterId=&cmCat=cat000000cat000730cat53330733)

Black, gold, mother-of-pearl—this bag screams sophistication. The finishing touch for your next formal event.    
Square Line Wooden Clutch in Lacquered Wood and Black Mother of Pearl, $2,480; Devi Kroell stores
